CustomField.formula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Suppress_Collections__c, ""), OR(Days_Past_Due__c = 10, Days_Past_Due__c = 15, Days_Past_Due__c = 30, Days_Past_Due__c = 45, Days_Past_Due__c = 60, Days_Past_Due__c = 74, Days_Past_Due__c = 81, Days_Past_Due__c = 88, Days_Past_Due__c = 90) )
CustomField.label: Collection Call Today
